repo.description: The most widely used Python to C compiler
repo.name: cython

body:
The issue was found in meson with Cython depfiles whose paths contain spaces see https://github.com/mesonbuild/meson/issues/15227.

I ended up only escaping spaces not backslashes to follow what `gcc -M` does. rust-bindgen decided to escape both spaces and back-slashes, see https://github.com/rust-lang/rust-bindgen/pull/2503.
 
This PR does seems to fix the meson issue seen in https://github.com/mesonbuild/meson/issues/15227.

commit.message: Escape spaces and back-slashes in depfile paths
Escape only spaces not backslashes to fix Windows failure
Tweak existing test to check handling of spaces in depfile
Add separate test rather than reusing the existing one

Revert "Add separate test rather than reusing the existing one"

This reverts commit 7bdc4f0221c9e04b2c67d90eb183df0e36fe607e.
Keep a sincle srctree with previous test and add more files in srctree

title: Escape spaces in depfile paths
